title: Ginger spice cookies
ingredients: ['550g plain flour', '4 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g shortening (see footnote)', '170g butter', '400g caster sugar', '2 eggs, beaten', '8 teaspoons molasses', 'granulated sugar, for coating']
